0.3.name: wordpress/bbpress-simple-advert-units
0.3.description:
Insert advert units in to your bbpress forum. You can use any sensible ad code you like assuming it fits into your forum's theme. The plugin is particularly suited to showing Google Adsense units.

Adverts can be injected into various parts of the forum: * Between posts * In the body of the first post * At the top and bottom of topic pages * On individual forum pages * On the top level forum page
